2/4/26, 2:20 PM Barcode readers - Jenski - Test portal- RPD Linux
Managing objects
Managing system objects / Barcode readers
Barcode readers
Barcode readers are the system representations of your cameras and barcode scanners. You can do a variety of tasks for barcode readers, such as
connecting and disconnecting them.
In this section:
Connecting and disconnecting barcode readers
Connecting and disconnecting a barcode reader controls the flow of barcode data into the barcode reader from the camera or barcode scanner.
A barcode reader can only receive barcode data if it is connected.
Parent topic: Managing system objects
